snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes Jim Cramer on technology companies that don't keep up, a criticism of companies paying developers to build apps...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes Jim Cramer on technology companies that don't keep up, a criticism of companies paying developers to build apps for their systems and a video essay about what works well on Instagram.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Instagram Manners, and Cramer on Hewlett-Packard
